p: On January 30, 2020, the International Health Regulations Emergency Committee of the WHO declared that the epidemic caused by the new coronavirus had become a “public health emergency of international concern” (PHEIC) [ 8]. Subsequently, the number of infections in China's neighboring countries (South Korea, Japan) increased exponentially, which caused panic among local people, and the number of new cases reported outside China exceeded the number of new cases in China for the first time on February 26, 2020 [ 9].
